deprecation.message: PlatformKit 2.3 and 2.4 contain major bugs and are no longer supported. Please upgrade to a newer version.

description: PlatformKit is a library dealing with Platform specific code, platform specific issues, and platform detection in C# .NET Core.
releaseNotes:
## Changes since 2.3 series

### Additions
* Added the ability to get information from WMI using the `GetWMIValue(string query, string wmiClass, string failMessage)` method in the new WindowsProcessManager class - This class is aimed to holding Windows specific extension methods for ProcessManager.
* Added the ability to get Registry `GetRegistryValue(string query, string value, string failMessage)` method in the new WindowsProcessManager class.

### Deprecations
* Deprecated `IsWindows()`, `IsMac()`, `IsLinux()`, `GetOSPlatform()` methods in the PlatformManager class - These have been moved to OSAnalyzer but will continue to exist in the PlatformManager class until it is removed PlatformKit version 3.0
* Deprecated `IsAppleSiliconMac()` and `GetMacProcessorType()` methods in the PlatformManager class - These have been moved to OSAnalyzer but will continue to exist in the PlatformManager class until it is removed in PlatformKit version 3.0.
* Deprecate some methods in PlatformManager
* Deprecated the `RunCommand`method - This will be removed in PlatformKit 3.0 and will not be replaced. Please use platform specific RunCommand methods instead.
* Deprecated the `RunCommandLinux` method - This will be removed in PlatformKit 3.0 . Please use the newly introduced but otherwise functionally identical `RunLinuxCommand` method

### Modifications
* Add optional parameter of ProcessStartInfo to `RunCommand()` and `RunProcess()` methods
* Increased `ShowLicenseInConsole()` duration requirement from 100ms to 500ms
* Revamped the `RunLinuxCommand()` method to not rely on or use Bash.
* Cleaned up code in some classes and methods
* Change exception type if Directory is not found.
* Minor Tweaks to `OpenUrlInBrowser()` method on Windows
* Allow non HTTPS links to be opened in the `OpenUrlInBrowser()` method
* Fix issues with `ShowLicenseInConsole()` method
* Minor tweaks to in code comments
* Cleaned up the code getting Windows Registry information
* Revamped the `GetLinuxDistributionInformation()` method to remove reliance on GNU Cat command.
* Replaced Linux code in the `OpenUrlInBrowser` method with a `RunLinuxCommand` method call.

### Removals
* Removed deprecated code in `MacProcessorType` enum

## Notes
* The `RunMacCommand()` method is temporarily disabled and will be re-enabled in a future version once this method has been reworked.
title: PlatformKit
